short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for selected text or image URL using the context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the context menu to search for selected text or image URL in various search engines

NOTE:

1) exporting and importing search engines requires the "Manage your downloads" permission
2) export added search engines to avoid losing them when updating the extension

If you have any questions, please contact me by email

Source code: https://github.com/roman-w3lifer-grinyov/crx-context-menu-search
